content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring iron ore from the chest to the furnace.

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring iron ore to the furnace.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a structure. Check your inventory levels to avoid such errors.

### Errors due to full storage entities
- Regularly check and empty storage entities like chests to prevent them from becoming full, which halts production processes.

### Errors due to lack of ingredients in furnaces
- Monitor the input inventory of furnaces to ensure they have the necessary ingredients for processing. Refill as needed to maintain continuous operation.
